mapper.sql: ID, NAME, STATUS, PARENT_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DESCRIPTION, CLASSIFY_STATUS,CODE,POSITION,IS_DELETED, IS_PUBLISH,KIND,PARAM_STATUS,ACCEPT_RANGE,PARAM_PUBLISH_RANGE, ATTCHMENT_ID,ORGNIZATION_ID,AUDIT_DATE,AUDIT_ADVISE,SUPPLIER_REGISTER_LEVEL,SUPPLIER_ENG_REG_LEVEL
mapper.select: from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and PARENT_ID=#{id} and IS_PUBLISH=0 order by CODE

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and PARENT_ID=#{id} order by CODE
select from ( SELECT * from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 START WITH PARENT_ID=#{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR id=PARENT_ID) where name like '%'||#{name}||'%'

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and PARAM_STATUS ='3'

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and PARAM_STATUS=#{paramStatus} order by CREATED_AT DESC

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'

select
from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' AND PARAM_STATUS = '3'
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY (ID, NAME, STATUS, PARENT_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, ATTCHMENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, CLASSIFY_STATUS, CODE, POSITION,IS_DELETED,IS_PUBLISH,KIND,PARAM_STATUS,ACCEPT_RANGE,PARAM_PUBLISH_RANGE) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{status}, #{parentId}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description}, #{classify}, #{code}, #{position},#{is_deleted},#{isPublish},#{kind},#{paramStatus},#{acceptRange},#{paramPublishRange})

insert into T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY
ID,
NAME,
STATUS,
PARENT_ID,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
DESCRIPTION,
CLASSIFY_STATUS,
CODE,
POSITION,
IS_DELETED,
IS_PUBLISH,
KIND,
PARAM_STATUS,
ACCEPT_RANGE,
PARAM_PUBLISH_RANGE,
ATTCHMENT_ID,
ORGNIZATION_ID,
SUPPLIER_REGISTER_LEVEL,
SUPPLIER_ENG_REG_LEVEL,
#{id},
#{name},
#{status},
#{parentId},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{description},
#{classify},
#{code},
#{position},
#{isDeleted},
#{isPublish},
#{kind},
#{paramStatus},
#{acceptRange},
#{paramPublishRange},
#{categoryAttchment.id},
#{orgnization.id},
#{level},
#{engLevel},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY
NAME = #{name},
STATUS = #{status},
PARENT_ID= #{parentId},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DESCRIPTION = #{description},
CLASSIFY_STATUS = #{classify},
CODE = #{code},
POSITION = #{position},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
IS_PUBLISH = #{isPublish},
KIND = #{kind},
PARAM_STATUS = #{paramStatus},
ACCEPT_RANGE= #{acceptRange},
PARAM_PUBLISH_RANGE = #{paramPublishRange},
ATTCHMENT_ID = #{categoryAttchment},
ORGNIZATION_ID = #{orgnization.id},
AUDIT_DATE = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AUDIT_PERSON_ID = #{auditPersonId},
AUDIT_ADVISE = #{auditAdvise}
SUPPLIER_REGISTER_LEVEL = #{level}
SUPPLIER_ENG_REG_LEVEL = #{engLevel}
where ID = #{id}
update T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY set NAME = #{name}, where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=1 and name = #{Name}
select count(1) from T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY where IS_DELETED=0 and CODE = #{code}

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED=0 AND PARENT_ID = #{id} AND PARAM_STATUS >= #{status} AND IS_PUBLISH = 1 ORDER BY POSITION

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED=0 AND PARENT_ID = #{id} AND IS_PUBLISH = 0
AND CLASSIFY_STATUS in (#{status},3)
ORDER BY CODE

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE 1 = 1 AND IS_DELETED=0
AND NAME like '%${param1}%'
AND CODE = #{param2}

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE 1 = 1 AND IS_DELETED=0
AND NAME like '%'||#{param1}||'%'
AND CODE like '%'||#{param2}||'%'
AND IS_PUBLISH = #{param3}

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED=0 AND PARAM_STATUS >= #{status} ORDER BY POSITION
SELECT FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 START WITH ID=#{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_ID=ID order by code
SELECT FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE PARAM_STATUS IS NOT NULL AND IS_DELETED = 0 START WITH PARENT_ID=#{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR ID=PARENT_ID

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 and IS_PUBLISH=0
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
ORDER BY CODE

SELECT T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY_PARAMETER.PARAM_NAME AS DESCRIPTION , T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY.NAME AS NAME,T_SES_BMS_DICTIONARY_DATA.NAME AS CODE, T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY.CLASSIFY_STATUS FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY_PARAMETER LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY ON T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY_PARAMETER.CATEGORY_ID=T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY.ID INNER JOIN T_SES_BMS_DICTIONARY_DATA ON T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY_PARAMETER.PARAM_TYPE_ID=T_SES_BMS_DICTIONARY_DATA.ID AND T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY.PARAM_STATUS=4 AND T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY_PARAMETER.IS_DELETED=0
AND T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY.NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
ORDER BY T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY.CODE
SELECT FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_PUBLISH = 0 AND IS_DELETED = 0 AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' START WITH PARENT_ID=#{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR ID=PARENT_ID ORDER BY CODE

SELECT
FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_PUBLISH = 0 AND IS_DELETED=0 AND PARENT_ID=#{id} ORDER BY CODE
SELECT FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 AND CODE = #{code}
